A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the best Star Wars movie released in years.  It subvert expectations and keeps you on the edge of your seat.  With great performances across the board\, the characters\, especially Rey and Ben\, are deeper than they've ever been.  It breaks away from the surface and gives us more Star Wars Lore than we've gotten from the movies in years.  Some follies were humor breaking the tone\, but every joke was a hit\, no matter how seemingly out of place.  Overall\, a must see.
